alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 24 at 3:18PM EDT until April 24 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTY... At 317 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plant City, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At approximately 3:10PM, broadcast media shared a video on social media of quarter-sized hail in the Plant City Area. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Plant City, Plant City Airport, and Dover. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
